Your Mike and Lisa sound like folks I would like to meet...maybe they have a bigger picture in view.  I look forward to your continued support and inspiring posts.  Ron L

lisbyfarrum <lisby@...> wrote:          Very cool. Let's get the show back on the road.

:)

Ann

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "bhali333"
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> After a good nights sleep and quite a few e-mails, I have decided to 
> stick with the group on a limited basis so that I can offer advice 
> from my experience to new people coming into the research.
> 
> I apologise for using this forum for my personal feelings but do not 
> apologise for my reaction, I think it was an appropriate response to 
> being called a fraud and a fake and lier.
> 
> Be that as it may, water under the bridge please forgive my inherent 
> defense mechanism.
> 
> I will be here to help in any way I can and strive to ignore negative 
> influence where ever it may come from.
> 
> I was also urged by mike and Lisa in a very definitive session today 
> to return for the sake of harmony and good will. So I will try to 
> live up to their ideal.
> 
> thanks for putting up with my outbursts.
> 
> Bruce
>



                         

       
---------------------------------
Never miss a thing.   Make Yahoo your homepage.
